result.arabic_text: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ لِتَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ جَعَلُوٓاْ أَصَٰبِعَهُمۡ فِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَٱسۡتَغۡشَوۡاْ ثِيَابَهُمۡ وَأَصَرُّواْ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ ٱسۡتِكۡبَارٗا
result.translation: Mu vy’ukuri, igihe cose ndabahamagariye ku kwemera kugira ngo Ubababarire ivyaha vyabo, baca bazibiza intoke amatwi yabo kugira ntibanyumve, bakipfuka n’impuzu zabo kugira ntibambone, gutyo bagatsimbatara ku buhakanyi, bakanirengagiza ukwemera ku manyama.
